statusLine.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".workspace.current_dir"); short_path=$(echo "$cwd" | sed "s|^$HOME|~|"); git_branch=""; if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); [ -n "$branch" ] && git_branch=" [$branch]"; fi; model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name" | sed "s/Claude //" | sed "s/3\.5/4.5/"); context=$(echo "$input" | jq ".context_window"); current_usage=$(echo "$context" | jq ".current_usage"); if [ "$current_usage" != "null" ]; then current_total=$(($(echo "$current_usage" | jq ".input_tokens + .cache_creation_input_tokens + .cache_read_input_tokens"))); window_size=$(echo "$context" | jq ".context_window_size"); current_k=$((current_total / 1000)); window_k=$((window_size / 1000)); token_info=" | ${current_k}k/${window_k}k tokens"; else token_info=""; fi; printf "%s%s | %s%s" "$short_path" "$git_branch" "$model" "$token_info"'
